analytics_data_platform_deploy_descripti: The OVH Data Analytics Platform includes all the tools you need to integrate, clean, process and view high volumes of data. We deploy and pre-configure a fully-secure Apache Hadoop cluster, based on the OVH Public Cloud. Transfer your data and follow the documentation to harness all the benefits of our Data Analytics Platform.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_flavor: {{ name }} ({{ cpuNumber }} CPU {{ ramCapacity }} GB RAM {{ diskCapacity }} GB disk)
analytics_data_platform_deploy_nodes_quo: The available quota has been exceeded.
analytics_data_platform_deploy_regions_s: Select a region and a datacenter
analytics_data_platform_deploy_quota_err: The {{cloud_name}} Public Cloud project does not meet the requirements necessary to deploy the Data Analytics Platform.
You can increase the quota for the {{cloud_name}} Public Cloud project, or change the sizing of the cluster in the previous steps.
analytics_data_platform_no_default_payme: No default payment method found. You will need to set a default payment method to create a Data Analytics Platform. Set a default payment method

analytics_data_platform_get_default_paym: Unable to retrieve the default payment method: {{message}}
analytics_data_platform_deploy_error: An error has occurred when attempting to deploy the Data Analytics Platform: {{message}}
